headline: Emerson Electric (EMR) Stock Declines While Market Improves: Some Information for Investors
summary: Emerson Electric (EMR) reachead $120.30 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -0.31% change compared to its last close.

headline: Emerson Electric (EMR) Forms 'Hammer Chart Pattern': Time for Bottom Fishing?
summary: Emerson Electric (EMR) witnesses a hammer chart pattern, indicating support found by the stock after losing some value lately. This coupled with an upward trend in earnings estimate revisions could mean a trend reversal for the stock in the near term.

headline: Is Emerson Electric (EMR) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Emerson Electric (EMR) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Emerson Electric : New Emerson Dewpoint Sensor Monitors Humidity and Air Quality in Real Time for Enhanced Reliability of Gas Processes
summary: Emerson today launched its new AVENTICS™ DS1 dew point sensor, the only industrial sensor to monitor dew point, temperature, humidity levels and quality of compressed air and other non-corrosive...
